portfolio.title: Sneaker Ecommerce App
portfolio.description: Ecommerce app developed using Flutter. Features a complete shopping cart sytem and Stripe secure payment via Express.js.

portfolio.title: Personal Website
portfolio.description: Website with mobile support showcasing interests, resume, contact info, and projects. Built with ReactJS and hosted on Netlify.

portfolio.title: Instagram Clone
portfolio.description: Instagram-like web app using React, Flask, and MySQL to handle post creation, interactions, and user authentication. Deployed on AWS.

portfolio.title: Forum Post Classifier
portfolio.description: Machine learning classifier to automatically predict the subject of student forum posts. Uses a custom templated map to retrieve data.
